title: Resilient Drylands: Innovating for Sustainable Agricultural Landscapes and Livelihoods

tasks.task: Welcome attendees and introduce the webinar topic.
subtasks: Introduce the webinar on Resilient Drylands and Sustainable Agricultural Landscape and Livelihoods.

tasks.task: Presenters' introductions and agenda for discussions.
subtasks: Introduce Miss Beth Bechdol, FAO Deputy Director General.
Invite and acknowledge Jackie Hughes from ICRISAT.
Discuss Samir Zingore’s presentation on soil health and plant nutrition.
Present Tomoko Harigaya’s views on digital agricultural innovations.
Share Temi Adegoroye’s insights on entrepreneurship and agri-food innovations.
Highlight Marcela Lemus de Roque’s experience with the Reclima project.
Summarize the key takeaways from the presentations.
Acknowledge the contributions of FAO’s directors and regional representatives.
Emphasize the need for continued action and collaboration in addressing dryland challenges.
